bibl.title: Manuscript Discoveries of the Future.
bibl.note: Paper read in 1991 in Los Angeles (University of California) and in Claremont (Institute for Antiquity and Christianity), published as No. 23 in the Occasional Papers of the Institute for Antiquity and Christianity of the Claremont Graduate School. - Makes six concrete proposals concerning a new ethos for editiones principes of highly important manuscripts.
ROBINSON James M., Manuscript Discoveries of the Future.
